DOC.brief_summary: A Long-term Follow-up Study Cardiac Safety Patients HER2 Positive Early Locally Advanced Breast Cancer Who Have Completed SB3-G31-BC
DOC.brief_title: A Long-term Follow-up Study Cardiac Safety Patients With HER2 ( + ) Breast Cancer Who Have Completed SB3-G31-BC
DOC.criteria: Subjects complete study treatment SB3G31BC . Subjects must provide informed consent . Subjects unwilling follow study requirement eligible study .
